Package com.pokerface.pokerapi.game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameRepository
    GameRepository is the database, wired up to an SQL database for storage it uses JAVA SQL for custom queries which the GameService might use.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AIService
    The AIService exists within the GameService as an object.
    Deck
    Deck is an object belonging 1-1 to a gamestate, it is the deck of cards used to play.
    GameAction
    GameAction is the form of the GameActions received from the FrontEnd.
    GameController
    The GameController serves vital function as the communication hub of the Front End users and the Back End server.
    GameInfoTransport  
    GameService
    GameService is the heart of the logic of the Back End.
    GameState
    GameState stores everything necessary to know about the state of a game.
    GameStateTransport
    GameStateTransport is the object that is communicated by the GameController to the Front End user, it represents the GameState as they see it, with only public information.
    HandEndTransport
    HandEndTransport is the object the sends when a hand ends and people have won money
    HandRanking
    HandRanking is used to evaluate hands by the GameService at a hands end to see who won, this ranking is then used by the pot to evaluate who gets what winnings.
    HandTransport
    HandTransport contains two cards, sent in the event of a newHand being dealt
    Player
    A player representation that lives in the GameState They have two card objects, an ID tied to the database of the user who is playing them, the seatID of where they are in the game, the GameState they belong to, if they have folded and if they are AI
    Pot
    Pot is a representation of the money being held for a hand of Poker.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Card
    This is an enum representing the cards in a deck.
    Card.Rank
    The Rank of playing cards, from Ace to King
    Card.Suit
    The suits of playing cards, Spades, CLubs, Diamonds and Hearts
    GameActionType
    GameActionType is an ENUM, the types of actions are mapped to poker actions, Call Check Raise Fold Bet, All In's are bets of total values or checks of not enough money, logically determined by GameService
    GameStateTransport.Reason
    GameStateTransport.Reason are all of the reasons that the GameStateTransport can be sent for.
    HandRanking.Type
    Type is all of the types of hands in a game of poker
